com.google.enterprise.connector.salesforce
Class FeederManager

java.lang.Object
  com.google.enterprise.connector.salesforce.FeederManager

public class FeederManager
extends java.lang.Object

Singleton Class used for a quartz callback.

This class holds a hashmap with ALL the BaseTraversalManager BaseTraversalManager inside this VM. THe quartz callback will pass in the connector name thats in context and we use that name to lookup the BaseTraversalManager.

Singleton Design pattern instance

setTraversalCallback

public void setTraversalCallback(BaseTraversalManager btm,
                                 BaseConnector connector)
Registers the traversal manager and connector instances with this singleton so that we have a handle to the connector when quartz invokes it.

Parameters:
btm - the traversal manager to register
connector - the connector in context

QuartzCallback

public void QuartzCallback(java.lang.String connector_name)
When quartz fires, it calls this class in the singelton with the name of the connector that just got fired

Parameters:
connector_name - the connector whose quartz just got triggered
